==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Wanderer
|language            = ko
|name                = 방랑자

<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 내 이름? 세간에서 나는 여러 이름으로 불리지. 모두 다 일반인이 평생을 노력해도 얻을 수 없는 명성을 가진 이름이지만, 이제는 과거일 뿐이야.<br />네가 부르고 싶은 대로 불러도 좋아. 이 기회에 네 품격을 확인해보고 싶으니까, 실망시키지 마
|vo_01_01_rm         = Nae ireum? Seganeseo naneun yeoreo ireumeuro bulliji. Modu da ilbanini pyeongsaeng'eul noryeokhaedo eodeul su eomneun myeongseong'eul gajin ireumijiman, ijeneun gwageoil ppuniya.<br />Nega bureugo sipeun daero bulleodo joa. I gihoee ne pumgyeogeul hwaginhaebogo sipeunikka, silmangsikiji ma
|vo_01_01_tl         = My name? I am called many names in this world. They are all names with fame that normal people cannot get their whole life, but now it's just the past.<br />You may call me whatever you want. I want to see your dignity in this opportunity, so don't disappoint me.

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・바람
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: The Wind
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - The Wind.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 바람도 언젠간 막다른 곳에 막히듯이 세상에 순수한 자유란 없어
|vo_02_01_rm         = Baramdo eonjengan makdareun gose makhideusi sesang'e sunsuhan jayuran eopsseo
|vo_02_01_tl         = As wind gets stopped in a dead end some time or other, there is no such pure freedom in this world.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・대화방식
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Manner of Speech
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Manner of Speech.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 내가 너무 쌀쌀맞다고? 난 사실을 있는 그대로 말할 뿐이야. 받아들이지 못하는 사람이 문제겠지
|vo_02_02_rm         = Naega neomu ssalssalmatdago? Nan sasireul inneun geudaero malhal ppuniya. Badadeuriji mothaneun sarami munjegejji
|vo_02_02_tl         = I'm too cold? I only tell the sheer truth. The person who cannot accept it is the problem.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・인사말
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Exchanging Pleasantries
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Exchanging Pleasantries.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 겉치레는 됐어. 억지로 대화를 이어 나가는 것도 우스꽝스러우니까
|vo_02_03_rm         = Geotchireneun dwaesseo. Eokjiro daehwareul ieo naganeun geotdo useukkwangseureounikka
|vo_02_03_tl         = No need to make a show. It's also silly to continue a conversation against one's will.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 내 삿갓으로 비를 막고 싶다고? 뻔뻔하긴
|vo_03_01_rm         = Nae satgaseuri bireul makgo sipdago? Ppeonppeonhagin
|vo_03_01_tl         = You want to stop the rain with my bamboo hat? How shameless.

|vo_03_02_title      = 비가 그친 후…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 햇빛 좀 봤다고 신나기는, 어린아이도 아니고
|vo_03_02_rm         = Haebit jom bwatdago sinnagineun, eorinaido anigo
|vo_03_02_tl         = Being excited for a bit of sunlight, you're not a kid.

|vo_03_03_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 칫… 짜증 나네
|vo_03_03_rm         = Chit... jjajeung nane
|vo_03_03_tl         = Hmph... how annoying.

|vo_03_04_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 비나 눈이나 다를 것도 없는데, 사람들은 눈을 더 좋아하는 걸 보면… 다 자기 팔자라는 게 있나 봐
|vo_03_04_rm         = Bina nunina dareul geotdo eomneunde, saramdeureun nunel deo joahaneun geol bomyeon... da jagi paljaraneun ge inna bwa
|vo_03_04_tl         = Rain and snow has little difference, but seeing how people like snow more... everyone must have their own fate.

|vo_03_05_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 이 정도 바람은 너도 일으킬 수 있겠지?
|vo_03_05_rm         = I jeongdo barameun neodo ireukil su itgejji?
|vo_03_05_tl         = You can make a wind like this, right?

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 「얼른 일어나. 해가 중천이야」… 라고 말하며 깨워줄 거라고 기대하는 건 아니겠지?
|vo_04_01_rm         = "Eolleun ireona. Haega jungcheoniya"...rago malhamyeo kkaewojul georago gidaehaneun geon anigejji?
|vo_04_01_tl         = You're not expecting as if I would say "Wake up. The sun is up in the sky"... and wake you up?

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 난 식사가 필요 없으니, 너랑 옆에 있는 쪼그만 것이나 같이 잘 챙겨 먹어. 내가 신경 쓰지 않게 말이야
|vo_04_02_rm         = Nan siksaga piryo eopsseuni, neorang yeope inneun jjogeuman geosina gachi jal chaenggyeo meogeo. Naega singyeong sseuji anke mariya
|vo_04_02_tl         = I do not need to eat, so you and that little thing beside you eat well. So that I don't have to care.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 드디어 시시한 하루가 끝나가네
|vo_04_03_rm         = Deudieo sisihan haruga kkeutnagane
|vo_04_03_tl         = This boring day finally ends.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 내가 옆에 있으니까 잠이 안 오는 거야?
|vo_04_04_rm         = Naega yeope isseunikka jami an oneun geoya?
|vo_04_04_tl         = You can't sleep because I'm beside you?

<!-- About -->
|vo_06_01_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・인형
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Puppet
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Puppet.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 불살라진 인형은 재를 남기지. 그럼 잿더미에선 뭐가 태어날까…
|vo_06_01_rm         = Bulsallajin inhyeong'eun jaereul namgiji. Geureom jaetdeomieseon mwoga taeeonalkka...
|vo_06_01_tl         = A burnt doll leaves ashes. Then what would be born in ashes...

|vo_06_02_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・심장
|vo_06_02_friendship = 4
|vo_06_02_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Heart
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Heart.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 그건 아무래도 상관없어. 내 것이 될 수 없는 것에 집착해봤자 시간 낭비일 뿐이니까. 지금 난 더 중요한 할 일이 있어
|vo_06_02_rm         = Geugeon amuraedo sanggwaneopsseo. Nae geosi doel su eomneun geose jipchakhaebwatja sigan nangbiil ppuninikka. Jigeum nan deo jung'yohan hal iri isseo
|vo_06_02_tl         = It doesn't matter. It's just a waste of time to obsess over what can't be mine. Now, I have more important things to do.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_03_title      = 우리에 대해・적수
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Rivals
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Rivals.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 우리가 서로 적대하던 시절을 아직도 마음에 담아두고 있다고? 오, 그래서 어쩔 건데? 천천히 생각해 봐. 난 급할 거 없으니까
|vo_06_03_rm         = Uriga seoro jeokdaehadeon sijeoreul ajikdo maeume damadugo itdago? O, geuraeseo eojjeon geonde? Cheoncheonhi saenggakhae bwa. Nan geuphal geo eopsseunikka
|vo_06_03_tl         = You still have the times when we were against each other in mind? Oh, so what are you going to do about it? Think of it slowly. It doesn't have to be too fast for me.

|vo_06_04_title      = 우리에 대해・동료
|vo_06_04_friendship = 6
|vo_06_04_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_06_04_subtitle   = About Us: Collaborators
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Collaborators.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx         = 난 「정의」에 귀의하지는 않겠지만 은혜를 갚겠다는 약속은 꼭 지킬 거야.<br />그나저나 나와 함께한다면 곤란해질 텐데 괜찮겠어? 다른 사람들이 너를 죄인과 「결탁」하는 악당 취급해도 난 책임 안 진다
|vo_06_04_rm         = Nan "Jeong'ui"e gwiuihajineun ankejjiman eunhyereul gapgetdaneun yaksogeun kkok jikil geoya.<br />Geunajeona nawa hamkkehandamyeon gonranhaejil tende gwaenchankesseo? Dareun saramdeuri neoreul joeingwa "Gyeoltak"haneun akdang chwigeuphaedo nan chaegim an jinda
|vo_06_04_tl         = I won't go back to "Justice", but I'll keep my promise to repay you.<br />You'll be in trouble with me, by the way, are you okay with it? I won't take responsibility if others treat you as a villain who "Conspires" with a sinner.

<!-- Miscellany I -->
|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「신의 주시」라는 건 상당히 불쾌하지만 쓸 수 있는 힘을 굳이 따지고 거를 필요는 없지. 넌 「바람 원소」에 깊은 의미가 담겨 있다고 생각한다고? 훗, 어째서 그렇게 생각하지? 신이란 제멋대로인 존재야. 내가 보여줬잖아
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Sin-ui Jusi"raneun geon sangdanghi bulkwaehajiman sseul su inneun himeul guji ttajigo georeul piryoneun eopjji. Neon "Baram Wonso"e gipeun uimiga damgyeo itdago saenggakhandago? Hut, eojjaeseo geureoke saenggakhaji? Siniran jemeotdaeroin jonjaeya. Naega boyeojwotjana
|vo_07_01_tl         = The "Gaze of a God" is quite uncomfortable but there is no need to think much about powers I can use. You think "Anemo" has a deep meaning in it? Hut, why do you think so? A God is someone who does what they want. I showed you.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 없어. 궁금한 게 있으면 물어봐도 좋아. 기분이 좋으면 알려줄게
|vo_07_02_rm         = Eopsseo. Gunggeumhan ge isseumyeon mureobwado joa. Gibuni joeumyeon allyeojulge
|vo_07_02_tl         = I don't have anything. If you want to ask anything, it's alright. If I feel pleasant enough, I'll tell you.

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 저기 봐. 새는 깃털을 뽐내고 다람쥐는 도토리를 모으며 인간은 먹고살기 위해 온종일 일하지. 생각이 단순한 생물일수록 살기 편하다니까
|vo_07_03_rm         = Jeogi bwa. Saeneun git'teoreul ppomnaego daramjwineun dotorireul moeumyeo inganeun meokgosalgi wihae onjong'il ilhaji. Saenggagi dansunhan saengmurilsurok salgi pyeonhadanikka
|vo_07_03_tl         = Look there. Birds show off their feathers, squirrels collect acorns, and humans work all day to make ends meet. The simpler a creature is, the easier it is to live.

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title      = 작은 쿠사나리 화신에 대해…
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lesser Lord Kusanali.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 그녀는 이용 가치가 있다는 이유만으로 날 살려둔 건 아닐 거야. 현명하고 자비로운 마음 때문일 수도 있고, 아니면 내 고독한 그림자를 보고… 내가 악의적인 추측을 하고 있다고? 하, 당연하잖아! 난 착한 사람이 아니니까
|vo_08_01_rm         = Geunyeoneun iyong gachiga itdaneun iyumaneuro nal sallyeodun geon anil geoya. Hyeonmyeonghago jabiroun maeum ttaemunil sudo itgo, animyeon nae godokhan geurimjareul bogo... naega aguijeogun chucheugeul hago itdago? Ha, dang'yeonhajana! Nan chakhan sarami aninikka
|vo_08_01_tl         = She mustn't have saved me only because I'm usable. Maybe it's because of her wise and gracious mind, or she saw my lone shadow and... I'm making malicious assumptions? Ha, it's reasonable! I'm not a kind person.

|vo_08_02_title      = 라이덴 쇼군에 대해…
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 자신의 창조물을 나 몰라라 했으면서, 차마 간섭할 수 없었다고 미화했지…
|vo_08_02_rm         = Jasin-ui changjomureul na mollara haesseumyeonseo, chama ganseophal su eopsseotdago mihwahaejji...
|vo_08_02_tl         = She acted as if she didn't know her creation, but also glorified saying she couldn't bear to interfere...

|vo_08_03_title      = 「여왕」에 대해…
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About the [[Tsaritsa]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Tsaritsa.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 사람들은 그녀의 자애를 찬양하지만, 「사랑」도 「죄」가 될 수 있단 건 모르지. 보상 심리에 빠진다고 할까나?
|vo_08_03_rm         = Saramdeureun geunyeo-ui ja'ereul chanyanghajiman, "Sarang"do "Joe"ga doel su itdan geon moreuji. Bosang simrie ppajindago halkkana?
|vo_08_03_tl         = People praise her for her kindness, but they don't know that "Love" can be a "Sin". Should I say people get in a compensation mentality?

|vo_08_04_title      = 「피에로」에 대해…
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Pierro|The Jester]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Jester.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 「피에로」가 켄리아의 유민이란 사실을 제외하면 나도 딱히 아는 게 없어. 제대로 된 대화를 해봤어야 알지. 하지만 나한테 바라는 건 있는지, 꽤 중요한 임무를 여러 번 맡기더라고. 「심연」으로 향하는 것도 그중 하나였어
|vo_08_04_rm         = "Piero"ga Kenria-ui yuminiran sasireul je'oehamyeon nado ttakhi aneun ge eopsseo. Jedaero doen daehwareul haebwasseoya alji. Hajiman nahante baraneun geon iteunji, kkwae jung'yohan immureul yeoreo beon matgideorago. "Simyeon"euro hyanghaneun geotdo geujung hanayeosseo
|vo_08_04_tl         = I don't know much except for the fact that "Pierro" is a migrant from Khaenri'ah. I would know if I had a proper conversation with hi. But he seemed to want many things for me as he made me do a few important missions. One of those were heading to the "Abyss".

|vo_08_05_title      = 「카피타노」에 대해…
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Il Capitano|The Captain]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Captain.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 「강직하고 청렴한 『카피타노』」, 「정직하고 과감한 『카피타노』」, 「수많은 공을 세운 『카피타노』」…. 우인단에서 도는 말들을 얼마나 많이 들었는지 귀에 딱지가 앉을 지경이야. 하지만 절대적인 「올곧음」만큼 위험한 게 있을까? 더구나 「카피타노」는 절대적인 실력까지 갖추고 있지
|vo_08_05_rm         = "Gangjikhago cheongryeomhan 'Capitano'", "Jeongjikhago gwagamhan 'Capitano'", "Sumaneun gong'eul seun 'Capitano'"... Uindaneseo doneun maldeureul eolmana mani deureotneunji gwie ttakjiga anjeul jigyeong'iya. Hajiman jeoldaejeogin "Olgojeum"mankeum wiheomhan ge isseulkka? Deoguna "Capitano"neun jeoldaejeogin silleyokkkaji gatchugo ijji
|vo_08_05_tl         = "Upright and Incorruptible 'Capitano'", "Honest and Daring 'Capitano'", "'Capitano' Who Made Many Contributions"... I have heard too many rumors in the Fatui that I'm sick and tired of hearing it. But is there anything as dangerous as the absolute "Right"? Furthermore, "Capitano" has absolute skills as well.

|vo_08_06_title      = 「도토레」에 대해…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Il Dottore|The Doctor]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Doctor.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 안타깝게도 「도토레」가 작은 쿠사나리 화신의 말에 따라 수많은 조각을 소멸시키는 바람에, 그 자식을 한 조각씩 없애는 즐거움이 사라졌어
|vo_08_06_rm         = Antakapkkedo "Dotore"ga Jageun Kusanari Hwasin-ui mare ttara sumaneun jogageul somyeolsikineun barame, geu jasigeul han jogakssik eopssaeneun jeulgeoumi sarajyeosseo
|vo_08_06_tl         = It is pitiful that my excitement of getting rid of his pieces one by one has disappeared as "Dottore" extinguished his many pieces as how Lesser Lord Kusanali said.

|vo_08_07_title      = 「콜롬비나」에 대해…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Columbina|Damselette]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Damselette.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 너라면 「언제나」 멍하며, 「뭘 하든」 무덤덤한 「콜롬비나」를 만나면 어떻게 할 거야? 난 일단 한번 싸워볼 거고, 넌… 착한 게 탈이니까 피하는 게 좋을 거야
|vo_08_07_rm         = Neoramyeon "Eonjena" meonghamyeo, "Mwol hadeun" mudeomdeomhan "Kollombina"reul mannamyeon eotteoke hal geoya? Nan ildan hanbeon ssawobol geogo, neon... chakhan ge tarinikka pihaneun ge joeul geoya
|vo_08_07_tl         = What would you do if you met the "Always" vacant, calm when doing "Anything" "Columbina"? I'll first fight, and you... since you're too kind, you better avoid her.

|vo_08_08_title      = 「아를레키노」에 대해…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Arlecchino|The Knave]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Knave.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 「아를레키노」는 위선자야. 「우아」하고 「친절」하게 사람을 대하는 건 그들을 더 쉽게 「통제」하기 위함이지. 그녀의 광기를 마주한 사람들은 이미 다… 후~
|vo_08_08_rm         = "Areulrekino"neun wiseonjaya. "Ua"hago "Chinjeol"hage sarameul daehaneun geon geudeureul deo swipge "Tongje"hagi wihamiji. Geunyeo-ui gwanggireul majuhan saramdeureun imi da... hu~
|vo_08_08_tl         = "Arlecchino" is a hypocrite. The reason why she acts "Graceful" and "Kind" to people is to "Control" them more easily. People who saw her madness already... phew~

|vo_08_09_title      = 「풀치넬라」에 대해…
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Pulcinella|The Rooster]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Rooster.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 「풀치넬라」가 진심으로 아무런 대가 없이 자기 가족을 돌봐주고 있다고 생각하는 건 「타르탈리아」밖에 없어. 실제로 「풀치넬라」가 많이 도와주긴 했지만 그건 「네 가족은 내 손에 있다」는 경고나 다름없겠지?
|vo_08_09_rm         = "Pulchinella"ga jinsimeuro amureon daega eopssi jagi gajogeul dolbwajugo itdago saenggakhaneun geon "Tareutallia"bakke eopsseo. Siljero "Pulchinella"ga mani dowajugin haetjiman geugeon "Ne gajogeun nae sone itda"neun gyeonggona dareumeopgejji?
|vo_08_09_tl         = only "Tartaglia" thinks that "Pulcinella" truely takes care of his family with no price. "Pulcinella" did help them a lot, but it can also be a warning that "Your family is in my hands", huh?

|vo_08_10_title      = 「산드로네」에 대해…
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Sandrone|Marionette]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Marionette.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 「산드로네」는 연구에만 몰두하는 괴짜야. 하지만 그런 극단적인 행보에도 불구하고 만들어내는 건 쓰레기뿐이지. 집행관 서열도 나보다 한 단계 낮았고 말이야. 정말 불쌍한걸
|vo_08_10_rm         = "Sandeurone"neun yeongueman molduhaneun goejjaya. Hajiman geureon geukdanjeogin haengboedo bulguhago mandeureonaeneun geon sseuregippuniji. Jiphaenggwan seoyeoldo nagoda han dangye najatgo mariya. Jeongmal bulssanghangeol
|vo_08_10_tl         = "Sandrone" is a freak who only focuses on her research. But despite that extreme move, it's only garbage that she made. Her Harbinger rank was also one below me as well. What a pity.

|vo_08_11_title      = 「판탈로네」에 대해…
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Pantalone|Regrator]]
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Regrator.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 그 서열 9위 말하는 거구나. 「판탈로네」는 「공정 거래」에 너무 집착한 나머지 신과 인간의 타고 난 불평등까지 뒤집어엎을 생각을 하고 있어. 뭐 평범한 인간이 과분한 망상을 하는 건 특이한 게 아니지. 「판탈로네」는 능력만큼이나 안목도 평범해서 「도토레」와 손잡고 있어. 흥, 결과는 안 봐도 뻔해
|vo_08_11_rm         = Geu seoyeol guwi malhaneun geoguna. "Pantallone"neun "Gongjeong Georae"e neomu jipchakhan nameoji singwa ingan-ui tago nan bulpyeongdeungkkaji dwijibeoeopeul saenggageul hago isseo. Mwo pyeongbeomhan ingani gwabunhan mangsang'eul haneun geon teugihan ge aniji. "Pantallone"neun neungryeokmankeumina anmokdo pyeongbeomhaeseo "Dotore"wa sonjapgo isseo. Heung, gyeolgwaneun an bwado ppeonhae
|vo_08_11_tl         = The Ninth Harbinger, you say. "Pantalone" has obessed over "Fair Trade" too much that he is thinking of turning around the innate inequality between God and human. Well, it isn't especially different for a normal person to have undeserved delusions. "Pantalone" has an average insight just like his power, so he joined hands with "Dottore". Hmph, the result is too obvious.

|vo_08_12_title      = 「타르탈리아」에 대해…
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Tartaglia|Childe]]
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Childe.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 머리가 나쁘면 몸이라도 좋아야 하는데 「타르탈리아」는 둘 다 엉망이야. 집행관 말석조차 과분해서 우인단의 수준을 떨어뜨리고 있지. 우인단을 나와서 정말 다행이야
|vo_08_12_rm         = Meoriga nappeumyeon momirado joaya haneunde "Tareutallia"neun dul da eongmang'iya. Jiphaenggwa malseokjocha gwabunhaeseo Uindan-ui sujuneul tteoreotteurigo itji. Uindaneul nawaseo jeongmal dahaeng'iya
|vo_08_12_tl         = If one has a thick head, their body has to be built, but both are out of shape for "Tartaglia". The seat of the Eleventh Fatui Harbinger is unmerited for him that he is lowering the standards of the Fatui. I'm so glad that I quit the Fatui.

|vo_08_13_title      = 「시뇨라」에 대해…
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[La Signora|The Fair Lady]]
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Fair Lady.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = 「시뇨라」의 재에는 아무것도 없지. 난 미래를 잃은 사람에게는 관심 없어
|vo_08_13_rm         = "Sinyora"ui jaeeneun amugeotdo eopjji. Nan miraereul ireun saramegeneun gwansim eopsseo
|vo_08_13_tl         = There is nothing in "La Signora"'s ashes. I have no interset in those who lost their future.

|vo_08_14_title      = 야에 미코에 대해…
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_14_subtitle   = About [[Yae Miko]]
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yae Miko.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx         = 입만 산 요괴야. 신의 총애를 등에 업고 인간을 위하는 척하면서 자신의 즐거움만을 좇고 있지
|vo_08_14_rm         = Ipman san yogoeya. Sin-ui chong'aereul deung'e eopgo inganeul wihaneun cheokhamyeonseo jasin-ui jeulgeoummaneun jotgo ijji
|vo_08_14_tl         = She's a monster who is all mouth. She's got the love of God on his back and he's pretending to be for humans, and she's only looking for her own pleasure.

|vo_08_15_title      = 카에데하라 카즈하에 대해…
|vo_08_15_friendship = 4
|vo_08_15_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_08_15_subtitle   = About [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]
|vo_08_15_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaedehara Kazuha.ogg
|vo_08_15_tx         = 네가 말하는 카에데하라 가문의 후손은 혹시…. 뭐? 그 녀석도 바람 원소의 「신의 눈」을 가지고 있으며, 라이덴 쇼군의 검을 막아냈다고? 후후후… 하하하하하하하하!
|vo_08_15_rm         = Nega malhaneun Kaedehara Gamun-ui husoneun hoksi... Mwo? Geu nyeoseokdo baram wonso-ui "Sin-ui Nun"eul gajigo isseumyeo, Raiden Syogun-ui geomeul maganaetdago? Huhuhu... hahahahahahahaha!
|vo_08_15_tl         = Is the descendant of the Kaedehara Clan you're saying is probably... What? he also has an Anemo "Vision" and stopped the sword of the Raiden Shogun? Huhuhu... hahahahahahahaha!

|vo_09_01_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 나에 대해 알고 싶어 할 줄이야. 하지만 알게 되면 귀찮은 일이 생길걸?

|vo_09_02_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 아, 과거를 청산하려고 날 찾아오는 사람이 많을 거야. 난 오는 사람 막지 않는 주의라 상관없어. 오히려 기대되는걸
|vo_09_02_rm         = A, gwageoreul cheongsanharyeogo nal chajaoneun sarami maneul geoya. Nan oneun saram makji anneun juuira sanggwaneopsseo. Ohiryeo gidaedoeneungeol
|vo_09_02_tl         = Ah, there will be many people who will come to find me to clear away their past. I don't mind as I don't stop who comes. I'm rather anticipating it.

|vo_09_03_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 신이 되면 쓸데없는 감정은 다 버릴 수 있을 줄 알았는데, 지금은 생각이 바뀌었어. 적어도 「분노」만큼은 참 편리한 도구인 것 같아. 어디서 비롯됐든 말이야.<br />세상에 화 한 번 안 낸 인간이 있다고? 놀랍군, 정말 성깔이 하나도 없는 걸까?
|vo_09_03_rm         = Sini doemyeon sseuldeeomneun gamjeong'eun da beoril su isseul jul aratneunde, jigeumeun saenggagi bakkwieosseo. Jeobeodo "Bunno"mankeumeun cham pyeonrihan doguin geot gata. Eodiseo birotdwaetdeun mariya.<br />Sesang'e hwa han beon an naen ingani itdago? Nollapgun, jeongmal seongkkari hanado eomneun geolkka?
|vo_09_03_tl         = I thought I could throw away all useless emotions when I became a God, but now I've changed my mind. I think "Rage" is a very convenient tool, at least. No matter where it came from.<br />There's a person in the world who hasn't been angry at all? That's amazing, are they really not angry at all?

|vo_09_04_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 세계수에 들어간 순간, 난 차라리 내가 이 세상에 존재하지 않았으면 좋겠다는 생각을 했어.<br />그리고 세계수는 내 소원을 들어주었지. 하지만 내가 원하는 결과를 주진 않았어. 이 땅의 운명은 앞으로도 계속 이 땅을 밟고 살아가는 죄인을 농락할 거야
|vo_09_04_rm         = Segyesue deureogan sungan, nan charari naega i sesang'e jonjaehaji anasseumyeon jokettaneun saenggageul haesseo.<br />Geurigo segyesuneun nae sowoneul deureojueojji. Hajiman naega wonhaneun gyeolgwareul jujin anasseo. I ttang-ui unmyeong'eun apeurodo gyesok i ttang'eul balkko saraganeun joeineul nongrakhal geoya
|vo_09_04_tl         = The moment I went into the Irminsul, I thought that I'd rather not exist in this world.<br />And the Irminsul granted my wish. But it didn't give me the result I wanted. The fate of this land will keep turning a sinner around its finger.

|vo_09_05_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_quest      = Inversion of Genesis
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 너와 나 사이에 접점이 있는 건 사실이지만 언젠가는 다른 길을 걷게 될 거야. 그때 무슨 일이 생길지는, 때가 되면 알 수 있겠지?
|vo_09_05_rm         = Neowa na saie jeopjeomi inneun geon sasirijiman eonjenganeun dareul gireul geotge doel geoya. Geuttae museun iri saenggiljineun, ttaega doemyeon al su itgejji?
|vo_09_05_tl         = It is true that there are points of agreement between you and I, but we will walk different paths someday. We'll get to know what happens when the time comes, right?

|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 네 힘이 되어줄 순 있지만 날 동료로 여기는 건 위험한 생각이야. 네가 마주하고 있는 게 무엇인지 다시 생각해 봐. 그래도 두렵지 않으면 내 뒤에 서도 좋아
|vo_13_04_rm         = Ne himi doeeojul sun itjiman nal dongryoro yeogineun geon wiheomhan saenggagiya. Nega majuhago inneun ge mueosinji dasi saenggakhae bwa. Geuraedo duryeopji aneumyeon nae dwie seodo joa
|vo_13_04_tl         = I can be your power, but it's dangerous to think of me as a comrade. Think what you're facing now once more. If you are still not scared, then stand behind me.
}}
